headline: Goldman Sachs Anthropic AI Push Tests Efficiency Gains And Rich Valuation
summary: Goldman Sachs Group (NYSE:GS) has partnered with Anthropic to build AI powered autonomous agents for internal workflow automation. The collaboration focuses on automating complex functions such as trade and transaction accounting, client vetting, and onboarding. The project centers on Anthropic's Claude AI tools and is aimed at reshaping how the bank handles high volume, detail heavy processes. Goldman Sachs Group comes into this AI push with shares at $944.59 and a 1 year return of 48.5%,...
